actions.in_committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries. H. Rept. 102-249.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 145.
Mr. Studds moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
Cleared for White House.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Measure Signed in Senate.
Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Public Law No: 102-226.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: To designate the area in Calhoun County, Texas, known as Rancho La Bahia, as the "Myrtle Foester Whitmire National Wildlife Refuge".

summary.text: Designates the area in Calhoun County, Texas, known as Rancho La Bahia, as the Myrtle Foester Whitmire Division of the Aransas National Wildlife Refuge upon its acquisition by the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service.

titles.title: To designate the area in Calhoun County, Texas, known as Rancho La Bahia, as the "Myrtle Foester Whitmire National Wildlife Refuge".
